apps.title: ImagesExtractor
apps.description:
I am committed to becoming a leading developer in the Apple ecosystem. Serving billions of users, helping them save time, improve efficiency, and enhance quality of life, I will handle all the tedious and repetitive tasks.

ImagesExtractor is a powerful tool that helps you easily extract images in bulk from various documents and webpages, supporting common file formats and public web content. Whether it's images from work reports, personal eBook collections, or public images from the web, you can quickly extract and export them in batches, saving time and effort.

Main Features:
* Supports multiple file formats: Extract images from EPUB, PDF, PPT, Word, Excel, Pages, Keynote, Numbers files, and webpages.
* Web image extraction: Helps you extract accessible images from public webpages and content.
* Batch processing: Quickly extract images in bulk without repetitive operations.
* Local processing: All data processing is done locally on your device, ensuring your privacy and security.
* Easy export: One-click export of extracted images for convenient use.
* Simple interface: Intuitive and user-friendly interface design, allowing you to get started easily without complex learning.

Applicable Scenarios:
* Quickly extract images from PDF reports.
* Batch export illustrations from eBooks for personal collection or research.
* Extract useful charts and images from presentations or documents.
* Extract images from public webpages for easy saving or sharing.


Privacy & Security:
We highly value your privacy. All file processing is done locally on your device, and no data is uploaded to any server, ensuring your information remains safe and secure.

Download ImagesExtractor now and experience fast, convenient image extraction!

Contact Us:
If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact us at myhdify@gmail.com. We welcome your feedback and are committed to continuously improving the appâ€™s features.

Terms of Service ï¼š
https://hdify.notion.site/Terms-of-Service-ac53ad97c7454f6282e44817ab990804

PrivacyPolicyï¼š

apps.title: TXT to EPUB - eBook Converter
apps.description:
One-Tap Conversion, Professional Reading Experience Instantly convert your TXT novels and study materials into standard EPUB eBooks, compatible with all mainstream reading apps. Whether it's web novels or study notes, enjoy a professional-grade reading experience.

Core Features
Intelligent Conversion Engine
* TXT to EPUB3 standard format conversion
* Smart chapter recognition and automatic segmentation
* Auto-generate complete Table of Contents (TOC) structure
* Built-in professional typography styles

Versatile Layout Options
* Horizontal/Vertical layout switching
* Simplified/Traditional Chinese conversion (Chinese characters only, other languages unchanged)
* Custom cover and book metadata
* Flexible formatting configuration options

Premium User Experience
* Real-time progress visualization
* Native iOS sharing and export functionality
* Batch processing for high efficiency
* Clean interface, intuitive operation

Use Cases
Perfect for These Users
* Web Novel Enthusiasts - Organize collected TXT novels for unified reading management
* Writers/Editors - Format and publish works with professional presentation
* Students/Learners - Organize study materials for convenient offline reading
* Researchers - Document organization and archiving to boost work efficiency

Technical Advantages
Professional and Reliable Technology
* Full compatibility with EPUB3 international standards
* Smart recognition algorithms, stable processing of long novels
* Mobile-optimized for smooth user experience
* Local processing to protect user privacy and security

Download now and transform your TXT files into professional eBooks!

Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
â€¨Privacy Policy: https://hdify.notion.site/2037ac8f634681608d35caa6296e48b2â€¨

apps.title: EPUB Translator
apps.description:
Want to read foreign eBooks but blocked by language?â€¨

ã€ŒEPUB Translatorã€ lets you translate EPUB files in one click and create bilingual editions with ease. Supports multiple languages and translation engines. Import your file, choose source/target language and translation mode, view progress in real time, and export EPUBs compatible with major eReaders.â€¨Perfect for language learners, cross-language reading, and research work.

Key Features:
1. Supports Google & Microsoft Edge translation engines
2. Multiple target languages supported
3. Three translation modes: Translation Only / Original + Translation / Translation + Original
4. Local cache acceleration â€“ no need to re-translate repeated text
5. One-click EPUB export â€“ compatible with major eReaders
6. Custom layout export â€“ supports both horizontal and vertical reading

Terms of Service: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/â€¨

apps.title: DSearch:ADHD Focus Search Tool
apps.description:
Direct Search Access, Eliminate Feed Distractions

DSearch is a revolutionary anti-distraction cross-app search tool designed to protect your focus in the digital age. Using intelligent URL Scheme technology, it allows you to jump directly to search results in your target apps, completely bypassing homepage feeds and algorithmic distractions.

Now supports 46 popular apps and 58 major websites, plus custom website support â€” designed for even more use cases.

Core Features
One-tap access: Enter keywords, select app, jump straight to results
Bypass homepages: Avoid recommended content, ads, and infinite scroll feeds
50+ supported apps: TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, Amazon, Twitter, Reddit & more

Smart Anti-Distraction Reminders
Personalized alerts: 5/10-minute reminders to stay on track
Multiple reminder styles: Tech, zen, friendly tones available
Focus protection: Resist algorithmic temptations and stay goal-oriented

Personalized Experience
Custom themes: Multiple interface styles to choose from
Search history: Smart recording for quick access to past searches
Pinyin support: Fast app discovery with phonetic search
Favorites: Save frequently used searches and apps

Deep System Integration
Live Activity: Dynamic Island shows search status
Widget support: Quick search access from home screen
Multi-language: English, Simplified & Traditional Chinese

Perfect For
Research & Work: Jump to Wikipedia, Reddit results without getting sidetracked 
Shopping: Direct product search on Amazon, eBay without promotional distractions
Content Discovery: Find specific YouTube, TikTok videos without algorithm rabbit holes
Navigation: Quick map searches for efficient route planning

Why Choose DSearch?
Traditional Way: 
Open app â†’ Get distracted by feed â†’ Forget search purpose â†’ Waste time 
DSearch Way: 
Enter keyword â†’ Select app â†’ Direct results â†’ Mission accomplished

Download DSearch now and reclaim control over your attention. Experience the future of focused, efficient searching!

Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
â€¨Privacy Policy: https://hdify.notion.site/2037ac8f634681608d35caa6296e48b2â€¨

apps.title: Subtitle Translator Pro
apps.description:
Introduction
Subtitle Translator Pro is a powerful and efficient Mac application designed for processing and translating SRT subtitle files. Whether you are a filmmaker, video editor, or language learner, this app will significantly enhance your productivity by allowing you to easily batch translate and export subtitles.
Key Features

1. Batch Import SRT Files:
    * Support importing multiple SRT subtitle files at once, saving you time and effort.

2. One-Click Translation:
    * Utilizing the robust technologies of Google Translate and Microsoft Translator, you can translate subtitle content into various languages with a single click, reaching a global audience. Supports translation into multiple major languages, making your video content more diverse and inclusive.

3. Single-Language Subtitle Export:
    * After translation, you can choose to export single-language subtitle files for direct use in your video projects.

4. Bilingual Subtitle Export:
    * Provides the option to export bilingual subtitles, making it easier for learners or multilingual audiences to understand and learn different languages. The subtitle files will include both the original and translated content, presented in a bilingual format.

5. Separate Bilingual Subtitle Export:
    * Supports exporting bilingual subtitles as separate single-language files for independent use in various scenarios.

6. User-Friendly Interface:
    * A simple and intuitive user interface that is easy to use, even if it's your first time using such software.

Suitable For

* Filmmakers and Video Producers:
    * Quickly translate and export subtitles, improving the efficiency of creating multilingual versions of your films.

* Video Editors:
    * Easily manage and process multiple subtitle files, enhancing work efficiency.

* Language Learners:
    * More effectively learn and master foreign languages with the bilingual subtitle feature.

* Multilingual Video Creators:
    * Expand your audience, allowing more people to understand and appreciate your content.

apps.title: Localization Master
apps.description:
Localization Master is the ultimate macOS app, designed specifically for developers and localization teams to simplify the localization of Localizable.xcstrings files.

 With Localization Master, you can easily leverage Microsoft Edge, Google for batch translations, and seamlessly update your Xcode localization files, significantly boosting your productivity.Localization Master is the ultimate macOS app, designed specifically for developers and localization teams to simplify the localization of Localizable.xcstrings files. With Localization Master, you can easily leverage Microsoft Edge, Google for batch translations, and seamlessly update your Xcode localization files, significantly boosting your productivity.

 Key Features

- Effortless Parsing of Localizable.xcstrings Files: Easily import and parse your Localizable.xcstrings files, automatically detecting the texts that need translation.
- Support for Multiple Translation Services: Quickly use Microsoft Edge, Google for batch translations, ensuring accurate and diverse translation results.
- One-Click Xcode File Updates: Once translations are complete, directly update the results into Xcode localization files, streamlining your workflow.
- Simple and Intuitive User Interface: A user-friendly interface design allows you to focus on localization tasks, enhancing work efficiency.
- Support for customization: Provides JSON export, allowing you to use AI-assisted or manual translation, which can then be imported back into the app for unified processing.

 Problems Solved

- Significantly Boost Translation Efficiency: No more manual translations and file updates. Localization Master automates the process, saving you valuable time and effort.
- Ensure Translation Accuracy: Cross-verify translations with multiple services to improve the accuracy and reliability of the results.
- Simplify Localization Process: A one-stop solution that makes your localization work simple and efficient.

 Ideal For

- App Developers: Quickly translate your app into multiple languages, expanding your user base.
- Localization Teams: Enhance work efficiency and ensure translation quality.
- Project Managers: Simplify localization project management, saving time and costs.

 Why Choose Localization Master?

- Efficient: One-click operation to quickly complete localization tasks.
- Intelligent: Integrates multiple translation services, intelligently recommending the best translation.
- Reliable: Automatically detects and processes translation files, ensuring the accuracy of file structure and content.

Download Localization Master and experience a smooth and efficient localization workflow!

apps.title: GridSplit - AI Image Splitter
apps.description:
One-Tap AI Image Split & Save!

GridSplit makes it easy to split AI-generated grid images. Simply drag, select, and save instantly. Supports 2Ã—2, 3Ã—3, and more!

Hello everyone! Iâ€™d love to share the little story behind how I created GridSplit~

It all started with my wife. She absolutely loves creating with Midjourney, making tons of beautiful artworks every day . But every time she wanted to save an image, she had to go through a tedious process: clicking U1-U4, waiting for them to load, and then manually saving each oneâ€¦ Watching her repeat this over and over drove me, a programmer husband, absolutely crazy!

"Honey, why does it have to be so troublesome?"
"Because AI generates a 4-grid image, and if I want to save just one, this is the only way..."

And thatâ€™s when I decidedâ€”I had to build something to make this easier for her! Without telling her, I stayed up late working on a small tool, constantly tweaking it to make it as convenient as possible. After over 30 iterations, GridSplit was finally bornâ€”a little assistant designed to make saving images effortless.

 Itâ€™s super easy to use:

Just drag in an image (whether from your computer or browser)
- Choose your preferred splitting method (2Ã—2, 3Ã—3â€”whatever you need!)
- Click to save the one you love, instantly!
- When I finally installed GridSplit on her computer, I casually asked, "Hey, whatâ€™s this app? What does it do?"

And then came the moment I had been waiting forâ€”her eyes lit up with excitement as she said, "Wow, I can do this? This is amazing!" That was when I knewâ€”all those late nights of coding were worth it. I quietly left the room, letting her dive into her creative flow.

 If youâ€™re passionate about AI-generated art like my wife, GridSplit is here as a little gift just for you. For just the price of a cup of coffee , itâ€™ll be your perfect creative companion!

Iâ€™ve also recorded a demo videoâ€”itâ€™s super easy to follow!

And if GridSplit brings you joy, donâ€™t forget to leave us a 5-star review on the App Store!  Your support means the world to us and will help more creators discover this warm little tool.

Disclaimer: GridSplit is an independent image software and is not affiliated with Midjourney or any other AI image platform.

Terms of Service:
https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Privacy Policy:

apps.title: Wasabi 50 - Project 50 Journey
apps.description:
Wasabi 50

A habit-tracking app based on the Project 50 concept, designed to help you record and practice Project 50 more effectively.

Early Rising + Morning Routine + Exercise + Reading & Learning + Healthy Eating + Journaling = Life Transformation Formula

Key Highlights
1. Visual Magic Wall â€“ 50 digital sticky notes automatically spread, and progress interruptions never disappear.
2. Soul-Searching Journaling â€“ Each habit comes with fun prompts like "What did you realize while working out today?"
3. Social Sharing Assistant â€“ After logging your progress, generate stylish growth cards with one tap.
4. Anti-Grind Mode â€“ 15 minutes = 1 hour of workout; Sleeping 8 hours = Waking up early successfully.

Why Choose Wasabi 50?
* A special cure for chronic procrastinators
* A visual progress wall â€“ Start collecting your gold stars on the board.
* 7 habit-specific â€œcheat codesâ€ â€“ You define the rules:
    * "Failed to wake up early? Sleeping well counts too."
    * "No time to read? Audiobooks count."
* No social ranking | No spammy reminders | No perfectionism pressure

Wasabi 50 Might Not Be for You If:
* You want to freely add/remove habits (We focus on 7 core habits).
* You need others to supervise your progress (Here, you have only a warm progress wall).
* You expect a flawless streak record (Missed 3 days? Just tap to restore progress).

# Wasabi Philosophy
True discipline is not about extreme self-restraint.â€¨Itâ€™s about reading one more page each day.â€¨Itâ€™s about having the courage to start again after a break.â€¨Itâ€™s about looking at your magic wall and thinking, "Wow, Iâ€™ve come this far."

Keywords
Habit Building | Self-Discipline Tool | Growth Journal | Anxiety-Free Design | Life Tracking

Who Is It For?
â€¢ Struggling to wake up early? | Always breaking your reading streak? | An on-and-off fitness enthusiast?â€¨
â€¢ Stressed by writing summaries? | Want self-discipline without the pressure? | Aesthetically obsessed with social media?

apps.title: ShotFit â€“ Screenshot Resize
apps.description:
ShotFit is a Mac app that turns raw screenshots into polished, platform-ready preview images in seconds.â€¨Perfect for App Store listings, social media posts, cover designs, or tutorial visuals â€” without tedious cropping and editing.

Key Features:
* Smart Size Presets â€“ Includes Mac App Store, Bilibili, TikTok, Instagram, X/Twitter, and other popular aspect ratios
* Simple Editing â€“ Drag to move, zoom with sliders, or reset to the perfect fit in one click
* Stylish Backgrounds â€“ Solid colors, curated gradients, or image fills; save your favorite combos
* Smooth Rounded Corners â€“ Pixel-perfect, anti-aliased export exactly matching the preview
* Batch Export â€“ Process multiple images at once with automatic file reveal
* Auto Memory â€“ Remembers your last used settings for faster next-time use

Why ShotFit?
* Save time: Presets + batch export eliminate repetitive work
* Look better: Backgrounds and rounded corners give instant premium feel
* Worry-free: What you see is exactly what you get
* Easy to use: Clean UI and smooth controls â€” learn in minutes

Whoâ€™s it for?
* Developers, designers, and marketers
* Content creators for videos, covers, and tutorials
* Anyone who wants raw screenshots to look polished instantly

apps.title: PicHD Plus
apps.description:
The World of Anime, Crystal Clear!

Hey, anime fans! Still frustrated by blurry manga images? Donâ€™t worry, we get you!

Imagine this: your favorite anime character, every strand of hair, every expression sharp and clear. Or those stunning illustrations, where every detail is vividly visible. Sounds amazing, right?

Well, now itâ€™s all within reach! Our brand new AI-powered image upscaling app is here to satisfy your craving for a high-definition anime world.

Why choose us?
* Anime-Exclusive AI: Our AI is like a friend who really gets you, specially trained to enhance anime images to perfection.
* Privacy Protection: All processing is done on your device, ensuring that every treasured image remains completely secure.
* Simple and Easy to Use: Even if youâ€™re not tech-savvy, youâ€™ll find it easy to use. One-click operation makes your images crystal clear in an instant.
* A Must-Have for Manga Fans: Specifically optimized for manga and illustrations, ensuring every page delivers the best visual experience.

apps.title: VoiceSmith â€“ AI Voice Studio
apps.description:
Xiao Yinjiang is a professional voice synthesis application designed for creators and developers. It supports text-to-speech, SRT subtitle dubbing, podcast creation, and batch conversion, meeting diverse voice productivity needs. With intuitive parameter controls and real-time preview, you can quickly produce natural and smooth multilingual voiceovers and export high-quality audio with a single click.

Text-to-Speech (TTS)
* Multi-language and multi-voice options, supporting male/female voices and more
* Fine control over speech rate, pitch, and volume with real-time preview
* One-click audio export, ideal for dubbing, reading, narration, and more

SRT Subtitle Dubbing
* Import standard SRT files to automatically generate time-synced voiceovers
* Display subtitles and timeline, supporting single-line playback and full preview
* Share TTS voice parameter settings, keeping exported results synchronized with the timeline

Podcast Creation
* AI-assisted script generation with manual editing and optimization
* Multi-character voiceovers with background music integration
* One-click export of complete podcast audio

Use Cases: Short video/advertising dubbing, online courses and audiobooks, podcast production, multilingual content distribution, fast subtitle dubbing, and more. Download now to start creating professional AI voiceovers efficiently.

Terms of Service: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/â€¨
Privacy Policy: https://hdify.notion.site/2037ac8f634681608d35caa6296e48b2

apps.title: ScanWifi - Smart WiFi Scanner
apps.description:
ã€ScanWifi - Smart WiFi Scanner & Connection Toolã€‘
Tired of typing complex WiFi passwords? ScanWifi offers an efficient solution! Simply scan WiFi information from images or QR codes to instantly recognize and connect to networks, making your internet experience hassle-free.

ã€Key Featuresã€‘
Smart Text Recognition: Automatically extract WiFi names and passwords from photos or screenshots
QR Code Scanning: Quickly recognize WiFi QR codes and connect with one tap
Advanced Recognition Algorithm: Intelligently extract WiFi credentials from images with multiple possible matches
WiFi Sharing: Generate elegant WiFi connection cards and QR codes to easily share with friends and family
Network Management: Save frequently used WiFi information for quick access
Security & Privacy: All data stored locally on your device, ensuring your network security

ã€Use Casesã€‘
Quickly connect to WiFi information posted on walls in cafes and restaurants
Photograph and recognize hotel room WiFi password cards
Share home WiFi with visitors without verbally communicating complex passwords
Save and manage WiFi information for multiple locations
Quickly connect to networks printed on receipts, business cards, or documents
No more copying, memorizing, or repeatedly trying to enter WiFi passwords. ScanWifi makes network connections simple and natural. Download ScanWifi and say goodbye to WiFi connection troubles!
